Title: Landscape - XSL Presentation Framework
Description:
Landscape aims to provide a solid foundation to develop complex and feature rich frontends for web application or websites.
Never complain anymore for malformed HTML code or ultra rigid templates. Landscape is meant to give you the complete control over the generation of HTML code.
HomeWiki:
UPDATE: Landscape 0.2 is out!
--
Landscape is a flexible presentation framework for ASP.NET web applications written in C# and based on the XSLT language.

It is meant to take care of all the operation necessary to create flexible frontends for your ASP.NET applications

It currently supports the following features:
  • Dynamic User Controls definition
  • Can be used as an ASP.NET MVC XSLT view engine
  • Nestable templates
  • Template2Template parameters
  • Custom reusable presentation code definition (widgets)
  • XSLT template caching
  • Custom XSLT extensions definition
  • An XSLT Extension providing a  set of function for use into XSLT templates
  • Ability to override templates at runtime in order to reuse as much code as possible
